name: strixun-music-api
description: Cloudflare Worker for fetching copyright-free music from external sources

scripts.build:deps: pnpm --filter @strixun/types build && pnpm --filter @strixun/error-utils build && pnpm --filter @strixun/api-framework build
scripts.predev: pnpm run build:deps && pnpm run build:worker
scripts.predeploy: pnpm run build:deps && pnpm run build:worker
scripts.pretest: pnpm run build:deps && pnpm run build:worker
